interestingcomments.content: Can't connect my R6 to my Android phone via Bluetooth with the Camera Connect app. /!/ The Easy connection guide recommends to connect via Bluetooth. That's what I want to do. But when I go to my camera and try to "connect to smartphone" the camera automatically goes to "Change Wi-Fi to [Enable]" and there is no Bluetooth option. What am I doing wrong?
